name: Strawberry Divinity
author: Lorena Essner

ingredients.name: (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O or any other flavor

instructions: Combine sugar, syrup and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat stirring constantly. Reduce heat. Continue to cook without stirring until mixture reaches hard ball stage (252Â°) or until a small amount forms a hard ball in cold water. Beat egg whites in large bowl until fluffy. Gradually add Jell-O and beat until stiff peaks form. Slowly pour hot syrup into beaten egg whites, beating constant- ly. Beat just until candy loses its gloss and holds its shape. Drop by teaspoon onto wax paper or pour into pan. Cool and allow to set until firm.
